actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 93-1379.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #591 (366-24).
Referred to Senate Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1296.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #506 (84-5).
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-1561.
House agreed to conference report, roll call #675 (359-20).
House receded and concurred in certain Senate amendments.
House receded and concurred in certain Senate amendments with an amendment.
House disagreed to certain Senate amendments.
Senate agreed to House amendments to certain Senate amendments.
Senate receded from certain of its amendments.

official_title: A bill making appropriations for Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, and for other purposes.
short_title: Agriculture - Environmental and Consumer Protection Appropriation Act

summary.text: Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection Appropriation Act - Makes appropriations for agriculture-environmental and consumer protection programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, including: (1) Department of Agriculture programs, corporations and agencies; (2) rural development programs and funds; (3) environmental programs of independent agencies; and (4) consumer programs of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, the Food and Drug Administration, and the General Services Administration.

titles.title: Agriculture - Environmental and Consumer Protection Appropriation Act
A bill making appropriations for Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, and for other purposes.
